Name: Hentai Waifu Girls
About the game: «Hentai Waifu Girls» - is a hentai game with beautiful cyberpunk arts, nice music and special puzzle mechanics that you can play with one hand!(͡ ° ͜ʖ ͡ °) In the game, beautiful girls in sexy positions are waiting for you, from which you can take off all her clothes, consider all the details and discover some of the secrets. This is all combined with good music, nice effects and smooth animation, will make you relax after a hard day! Features: 8 colorful arts, each with 3 levels of nudity. Gallery of characters. Nice music. Steam Achievements. And also the ability to play with one hand.(͡ ~ ͜ʖ ͡ °) Automatic puzzle assembly. Press on the English 'T' on the keyboard to complete the level.
